duties_responsibilities.duty: Prospect, qualify, and sell B2B (catering and gifting) to new and lapsed corporate customers within an assigned geographical market.
Build relationships with new B2B customers to encourage frequent repeat business.
Achieve assigned sales targets on a monthly and trimester basis.
Record work completed daily in designated reporting system.
Provide customer service assistance to corporate clients and generate telemarketing activity reports on a regular basis.
Schedule and conduct Lunch and Learn seminars with businesses.
Build relationships with General Managers in the market to gain a better understanding of the market and the strengths of the stores.

education_certification.credential: Associate degree or equivalent work experience preferred.
